effect.name: Emboss
effect.description: Creates embossed relief image of source image
effect.author: Janne Liljeblad

parameter.name: azimuth
Light direction
parameter.comment:
The direction of the
embossing (practically simulating a light source)

parameter.name: elevation
Background lightness
parameter.comment:
Defines the lightness/brightness of the areas that are not embossed.
Range is 0 to 90.

parameter.name: width45
Bump height
parameter.comment:
Defines the thickness of the edges increasing/decreasing the perceived depth of the embossed areas.
Range is 0 to 40.
